column5: Went out with Tupelo and my Bro yesterday for the entire day. Was a tad chilly but an overall beauty day. Hooked into 3 low 30 inch musky but only landed one while casting inline spinners. Caught a smallie and then a 30" pike while trolling, my first ever there. The pike in Balsam are eating very well. Super thick. The family and I enjoyed it for dinner today. The other two in the boat successfully picked on the perch all day. Thanks for the day out Adam. Sweet rig.

good stuff...I just finished eating my Balsam pike from Thursday. It actually was pretty good. My one son loved it and couldn't get enough. I agree with you they are eating well. My pike was mid 30's and solid. I have not turned into a fish-eater yet, but I will certainly extinguish any pike from Balsam.
nice.. one day I will catch a muskie
But - I think I might be getting addicted to Muskie Fishing.....
